Body:
self.setUpClass()
num_qubits = 3
p = ql.Program('test_unitary_pass', platform, num_qubits)
k = ql.Kernel('akernel', platform, num_qubits)
u = ql.Unitary('u1', [complex(1.0, 0.0), complex(0.0, 0.0), complex(0.0, 
    0.0), complex(0.0, 1.0)])
k.gate('s', [0])
with self.assertRaises(Exception) as cm:
    k.gate(u, [2])
self.assertEqual(str(cm.exception),
    "Unitary 'u1' not decomposed. Cannot be added to kernel!")
